recommended_degree: Administrasi Logistik, Teknik Logistik, Manajemen Logistik, Administrasi Bisnis, Manajemen (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Provide daily administrative assistance related to logistics documentation.
2. Follow up documents that need confirmation with forwarders.
3. Collect data and prepare reports.
4. Assist in document filing and administration.
5. Help check weekly invoices from existing vendors, including handling revisions.
6. Check incomplete documents and support data collection, reporting, and filing tasks.
